flawed_nl_solution:
The width of his garden is going to be 1000 / 8 = <<1000/8=125>>125 feet.
The length of his garden is going to be 2250 / 10 = <<2250/10=252>>252 feet.
So the area of his garden is going to be 125 X 252 = 31500 square feet.
#### 31500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 225, not 252. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
